title: Embroidery Sample, 1790–1800
medium:
Medium: silk, net
Technique: embroidered and appliqued on uncut supplementary warp pile in a satin foundation (velvet)
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Multicolored silk embroidery in a floral design and net applique on a dark purple ground with wavy vertical blue stripes.
